title: PREMIUM-Ep. 267: Avicenna on God and Soul w/ Peter Adamson (Part Two)
description:
Continuing on Avicenna's arguments for the existence of God and on the soul's immateriality. What metaphysical and epistemological picture grounds these views?

To hear the full second part, you'll need to go sign up at partiallyexaminedlife.com/support.
